title: Roxy Jacenko and her children Pixie, eight, and Hunter, five show off their skeleton onesies
text:
She's the PR queen who knows how to get a celebration started.

And Roxy Jacenko has kicked off Halloween festivities with her children a few days early.

The publicist took to Instagram on Thursday to share a snap of herself posing in bed, with daughter Pixie, eight, and son Hunter, five, pretending to sleep.

Spooky sleep time! Roxy Jacenko has kicked off Halloween festivities with her children, Pixie and Hunter, a few days early, by showing off their skeleton onesies from Peter Alexander sleepwear

The trio each wore the same skeleton onesie from Peter Alexander sleepwear as they cosied up on the bed.

Roxy joked in the caption of the post: 'Attempting to get a photo in our new Halloween @peteralexanderofficial PJs is much more challenging than I anticipated.'

She also took to her Instagram story to share a selfie of herself with Hunter as they playfully posed with their tongues out.

Fun with mum! Roxy took to her Instagram story where she shared a selfie of herself with Hunter playfully posing with their tongues out

In another clip, the blonde business woman shared a mirror selfie with Pixie as they proudly showed off their fun and spooky new sleep ensembles.

'When one should be in bed,' she wrote in the caption.

The mother-daughter duo enjoy wearing matching outfits, and recently the young fashionista featured in one of Roxy's recent photoshoots.

'When one should be in bed!' The blonde business woman also shared a mirror selfie with Pixie, as they proudly showed off their fun new sleep ensembles

On Tuesday, they flaunted matching nightwear in a shoot for local label Cartel and Willow.

Proud mum Roxy captioned her post: 'Twinning with my Pix'.

While Pixie went barefoot for the photos, her mum wore a $786 pair of Chanel PVC Slides.
description: She's the PR queen who knows how to get a celebration started.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
